price: A nagrada na onome svijetu bolja je za one koji vjeruju i koji se Allaha boje.
arabic: وَلَأَجۡرُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ خَيۡرٞ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَكَانُواْ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wala-ajru al-ākhirati khayrun lilladhīna āmanū wakānū yattaqūna
